events.message: We have received the application from a highly qualified software engineer interested in the backend developer position.
The candidateâ€™s profile has been reviewed and categorised under Engineering due to relevant software development experience.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage the communication and scheduling for this engineering applicant.
Initial screening call was conducted successfully, and the candidate demonstrated strong problem-solving skills and engineering knowledge.
The candidate responded positively to the screening feedback and expressed enthusiasm for moving forward to technical interviews.
A technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate with the engineering team to evaluate coding and system design skills.
The candidate completed the technical interview and showed excellent proficiency in backend development and architecture design.
Following the successful technical interview, an HR interview was scheduled to discuss company fit and benefits.
The HR interview went well. The candidate aligned with company values and showed keen interest in the role and culture.
An official job offer was proposed to the candidate including competitive compensation and benefits for the engineering position.
The candidate provided positive feedback about the offer and expressed excitement about potentially joining the engineering team.
The candidate formally accepted the job offer and confirmed availability to start the onboarding process soon.
The onboarding process was initiated with orientation sessions and setup of engineering tools and access.
The hiring case was successfully closed with the candidate fully onboarded and integrated into the engineering team.
